docs.hub.title: IRP Documentation
docs.hub.subtitle: Welcome to the IRP documentation hub. This section explains who we are, how the city works, and what we expect from players and staff.
docs.quickstart.title: Quick start
docs.quickstart.body: Read Getting Started, then review the SOP Library for your role.
docs.getting_started.desc: Join IRP, learn scene standards, and get your first day right.

docs.goals.desc: Where IRP is headed and what we care about most.
docs.faq.desc: Common questions, reporting guidance, scene expectations.
handbook.reporting.title: Reporting and Tickets
handbook.reporting.subtitle: If something goes wrong during a scene, stay in character and finish the scene. Afterward, report it through Discord support using the correct ticket option.
handbook.reporting.note.title: Scene-first policy
handbook.reporting.note.body: Do not stop scenes to argue OOC. Finish the scene, then report with evidence.
